headline: SanDisk Rides AI Memory Supercycle As NAND Shortage Extends To 2028
summary: SanDisk, NasdaqGS:SNDK, is seeing intense demand for its NAND flash memory as AI data center build outs strain industry supply. Supply shortages are now flagged as persisting through 2028, with hyperscale customers locking in multi year capacity commitments. The company reports record revenue and earnings, alongside new product ramps and expanded production through its Kioxia joint venture. Since its spin off from Western Digital, SanDisk’s pure play focus on NAND has coincided with very...

headline: Western Digital’s Week in Review: Shares Now Up 63% in 2026
summary: Western Digital (NASDAQ:WDC) moved sideways this week, dipping 0.35% to close at $281.58 on February 13. But zoom out, and the picture changes dramatically. The stock is up 31% over the past month and 63% year-to-date, riding a wave of AI storage demand that’s reshaping the data center landscape. While the broader semiconductor sector, tracked ...
